amazonFlywheel.title: Amazon Flywheel Dashboard
amazonFlywheel.subtitle: Sales Performance & Analytics Platform
amazonFlywheel.description: A comprehensive sales and performance dashboard built to track Amazon marketplace metrics and optimize product strategies. This platform provides real-time insights into sales performance, inventory management, and competitive analysis.

challenges.title: Amazon API Rate Limiting
challenges.solution: Implemented intelligent queuing and caching strategies to handle Amazon's strict API rate limits while maintaining real-time data freshness.

challenges.title: Data Volume & Performance
challenges.solution: Built efficient data processing pipelines to handle large volumes of marketplace data with sub-second response times.

challenges.title: Multi-marketplace Integration
challenges.solution: Created a unified data model to handle variations across different Amazon marketplaces and regions.

soundAround.title: Sound Around Admin Portal
soundAround.subtitle: Audio Content Management & Distribution Platform
soundAround.description: Internal administration portal for managing audio content distribution and user management across multiple platforms. This system handles content ingestion, processing, distribution, and analytics for a large-scale audio platform.

challenges.title: Audio Processing at Scale
challenges.solution: Developed efficient audio processing pipelines that handle multiple formats and quality levels while maintaining processing speed and audio fidelity.

challenges.title: Multi-Platform Distribution
challenges.solution: Created a flexible distribution system that adapts content for different platforms while maintaining metadata consistency.

challenges.title: User Permission Complexity
challenges.solution: Implemented a granular role-based permission system that handles complex organizational hierarchies and content access controls.

serenelife.title: SereneLife App
serenelife.subtitle: OEM Smart Home Control & Automation Platform
serenelife.description: OEM Smart home application for controlling and monitoring connected devices with custom automation workflows. Built from the ground up to provide seamless integration between various smart home devices and intuitive user control interfaces.

challenges.title: Device Compatibility
challenges.solution: Created a universal device communication layer that handles multiple protocols and manufacturer variations while maintaining consistent user experience.

challenges.title: Real-Time Synchronization
challenges.solution: Implemented efficient real-time communication between devices and mobile app, ensuring instant status updates and control responsiveness.

challenges.title: Custom Automation Logic
challenges.solution: Built a flexible automation engine that allows users to create complex workflows without programming knowledge, while providing advanced options for power users.

oemPartnership.title: OEM Partnership Success
oemPartnership.description: This project was delivered as a white-label solution for a major smart home device manufacturer, demonstrating the ability to build scalable, enterprise-ready applications that serve as the foundation for other companies' products.
